Rainy_Day_0: Is that a leak I hear?#$e#Don't worry, I'll take care of it, my love.
Rainy_Day_1: Today is a bad day for flying.#$e#Don't worry about me, I'll find something else to do.
Rainy_Day_2: You'll never believe what they've sent me today.$2#$e#Maybe you can use this? [334 335 336 337 338 910]
Rainy_Day_3: Today is a good day to call customer service.#$e#What? The weather is too bad to do anything else.$7
Rainy_Day_4: I think I'll make a list of parts I need.
patio_OdoFS: I wish there were enough space for my plane here.$6#$e#No, don't worry, my love. I'm happy here.$8
Rainy_Night_1: Maybe we should go to bed early tonight.
Rainy_Night_2: The sound of the rain on the roof makes me sleepy.
Rainy_Night_3: Did you drip on the floor?#$e#It's just that I mopped it today...$6
Rainy_Night_4: Long day? I made supper for us.[197 240 215]
Rainy_Night_5: Come and get dry by the fire. Then we can go to bed?
Indoor_Day_0: Maybe I'll work on my models today.$1
Indoor_Day_1: I got up early and made a surprise for you! I hope you like it...[197 215 237 204]
Indoor_Day_2: Don't worry about the house, I'll take care of things here.
Indoor_Day_3: How do you think my brothers are doing without me?#$e#I'm sure they are fine, it's little Garth I worry about.
Indoor_Day_4: I wish I knew more about farming. Then I could help!
Indoor_Night_0: My love! You've returned!$1#$e#Was that too over the top?$5
Indoor_Night_2: Long day, my love? Shall we go to bed early tonight?
Indoor_Night_3: Did you have a productive day, my love?
Indoor_Night_4: Busy day? I cleaned the kitchen today.
Outdoor_0: I love what you've done here.#$e#You've made such a wonderful place for us.
Outdoor_1: It's a bit different from my dad's ranch, but it's familiar at the same time.
Outdoor_2: I feel more at home here than I ever did on Schafer Ranch, is that weird?
Outdoor_3: Ah, my love! You've made such a nice place here.
Outdoor_4: I'm just enjoying the fresh air. I'll go back inside soon.
OneKid_0: Can you believe we are parents?!?#$e#I'm still in shock.
OneKid_1: Little %kid1 is growing so fast!#$e#Do you want to have more children?
OneKid_3: I'm a little nervous about having more kids.#$e#Twins run in the family, you know.
TwoKids_1: %kid1 seems so grown up now that we have little %kid2.
TwoKids_2: I hope %kid1 and %kid2 will have lots of cousins.#$e#Maybe I should let them pester my brothers.
TwoKids_3: %kid1 is teaching %kid2 about planes.#$e#I've never been so proud.$5
funLeave_OdoFS: I'm going to meet Garth today.
funReturn_OdoFS: Garth is doing well.$8#$e#He's kinda taken over my shed now that I've moved here.$7
spring_12: Are we going to the Egg Festival tomorrow?
spring_23: Are we going to the Flower Dance tomorrow?#$e#I've been practicing...
summer_10: Shall we go to the Luau tomorrow?#$e#I think you should put a cauliflower in the soup!
summer_28: Are we going to see the Moonlight Jellies tonight?
fall_15: Is our Grange Display all ready for tomorrow?
spring_OdoFS: Maybe shipping will be better this year?
fall_OdoFS: I love watching for planes this time of year.
summer_OdoFS: It can be hard to spot the planes flying in the bright sun.#$e#But it's still fun to look!
winter_OdoFS: Rather cold this winter, isn't it, my love?
spouseRoom_OdoFS: It's a bit smaller than my hobby shed...$1#$e#But I love having my hobbies right in the house!$8
